verses.verse: In the beginning <S%H7225><s%> 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heaven <S%H8064><s%> and <S%H853><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And the earth <S%H776><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8804><s%> without form <S%H8414><s%>, and void <S%H922><s%>; and darkness <S%H2822><s%> was upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%>. And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> moved <S%H7363><s%> <S%H8764><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%>.
And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let there be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> light <S%H216><s%>: and there was light <S%H216><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> <S%H853><s%> the light <S%H216><s%>, that <S%H3588><s%> it was good <S%H2896><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> divided <S%H914><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H996><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from <S%H996><s%> the darkness <S%H2822><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> Day <S%H3117><s%>, and the darkness <S%H2822><s%> he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Night <S%H3915><s%>. And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let there be a firmament <S%H7549><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%>, and let it divide <S%H914><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%>, and divided <S%H914><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were under <S%H8478><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> from the waters <S%H4325><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were above <S%H5921><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%>: and it was so <S%H3651><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the firmament <S%H7549><s%> Heaven <S%H8064><s%>. And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the second <S%H8145><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> under the heaven <S%H8064><s%> be gathered together <S%H6960><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> one <S%H259><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>, and let the dry <S%H3004><s%> land appear <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8735><s%>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the dry <S%H3004><s%> land Earth <S%H776><s%>; and the gathering together <S%H4723><s%> of the waters <S%H4325><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he Seas <S%H3220><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let the earth <S%H776><s%> bring forth <S%H1876><s%> <S%H8686><s%> grass <S%H1877><s%>, the herb <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8688><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, and the fruit <S%H6529><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, whose <S%H834><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> is in itself, upon the earth <S%H776><s%>: and it was so.

And the earth <S%H776><s%> brought forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> grass <S%H1877><s%>, and herb <S%H6212><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8688><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, and the tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> fruit <S%H6529><s%>, whose seed <S%H2233><s%> was in itself, after his kind <S%H4327><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.
And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the third <S%H7992><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let there be lights <S%H3974><s%> in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to divide <S%H914><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> from the night <S%H3915><s%>; and let them be for signs <S%H226><s%>, and for seasons <S%H4150><s%>, and for days <S%H3117><s%>, and years <S%H8141><s%>:
And let them be for lights <S%H3974><s%> in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> <S%H8687><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> lights <S%H3974><s%>; the greater <S%H1419><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%>, and the lesser <S%H6996><s%> light <S%H3974><s%> to rule <S%H4475><s%> the night <S%H3915><s%>: he made the stars <S%H3556><s%> also.
And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in the firmament <S%H7549><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> <S%H8687><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>,

And to rule <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8800><s%> over the day <S%H3117><s%> and over the night <S%H3915><s%>, and to divide <S%H914><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the light <S%H216><s%> from the darkness <S%H2822><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.
And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the fourth <S%H7243><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let the waters <S%H4325><s%> bring forth abundantly <S%H8317><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the moving creature <S%H8318><s%> that hath <S%H5315><s%> life <S%H2416><s%>, and fowl <S%H5775><s%> that may fly <S%H5774><s%> <S%H8787><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> in the open <S%H6440><s%> firmament <S%H7549><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8799><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> whales <S%H8577><s%>, and every living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, which the waters <S%H4325><s%> brought forth abundantly <S%H8317><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and every winged <S%H3671><s%> fowl <S%H5775><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%>, and let fowl <S%H5775><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>.
And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the fifth <S%H2549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let the earth <S%H776><s%> bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the living <S%H2416><s%> creature <S%H5315><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, cattle <S%H929><s%>, and creeping thing <S%H7431><s%>, and beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>, and cattle <S%H929><s%> after their kind <S%H4327><s%>, and every thing that creepeth <S%H7431><s%> upon the earth <S%H127><s%> after his kind <S%H4327><s%>: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was good <S%H2896><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let us make <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in our image <S%H6754><s%>, after our likeness <S%H1823><s%>: and let them have dominion <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and over the fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and over the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and over all the earth <S%H776><s%>, and over every creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

So 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8799><s%> man <S%H120><s%> in his own image <S%H6754><s%>, in the image <S%H6754><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he him; male <S%H2145><s%> and female <S%H5347><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> he them.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8762><s%> them, and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Be fruitful <S%H6509><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and replenish <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and subdue it <S%H3533><s%> <S%H8798><s%>: and have dominion <S%H7287><s%> <S%H8798><s%> over the fish <S%H1710><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%>, and over the fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and over every living thing <S%H2416><s%> that moveth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold <S%H2009><s%>, I have given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> you every herb <S%H6212><s%> bearing <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8802><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>, which is upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of all the earth <S%H776><s%>, and every tree <S%H6086><s%>, in the which is the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of a tree <S%H6086><s%> yielding <S%H2232><s%> <S%H8802><s%> seed <S%H2233><s%>; to you it shall be <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for meat <S%H402><s%>.

And to every beast <S%H2416><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and to every fowl <S%H5775><s%> of the air <S%H8064><s%>, and to every thing that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon the earth <S%H776><s%>, wherein there is life <S%H2416><s%> <S%H5315><s%>, I have given every green <S%H3418><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> for meat <S%H402><s%>: and it was so.

And 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every thing that <S%H834><s%> he had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and, behold, it was very <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>. And the evening <S%H6153><s%> and the morning <S%H1242><s%> were the sixth <S%H8345><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.
